name: Come Rain or Shine
description: The project will ask for the user's location so that it can display the day's forecast and provide places of interest near them by category.

name: Wishlist
description: The wishlist app allows the user to sign up for an account and create as many wishlists as they'd like- which are saved to a database. They can then view their wishlists in the future by logging back in. When the wishlists are viewed, the items become links to Amazon that display search results for said item.

name: Eat-da-burger
description: This application allows the user to enter custom burgers to a list entitled 'Burgers to be Devoured' and then individually 'devour' each burger using a button click. The 'devoured' burgers then appear on a separate list entitled 'Burgers Eaten'.

name: Random Password Generator
description: The random password generator can create a strong password for the user that meets their selected criteria.

name: Work Day Scheduler
description: The Work Day Scheduler allows the user to keep track of the event happening within their day.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: The weather dashboard allows a user to search for a city and find a variety of weather information for said city.
